name: Psychedelic Horseshit
description: '''Psychedelic Horseshit''' was an American [[Rock music|rock]] band formed in [[Columbus, Ohio]] in 2005. That same year, Kevin DeBroux of Pink Reason coined the [[microgenre]] and scene, known as "[[shitgaze]]" when referring to recordings of Horseshit's material. Lead singer Matt Whitehurst later added the term to the groups [[Myspace]] page where it was later popularized. The band has been described as "shitgaze frontrunners" by [[The Times|''The Times'']].
